law.catch_line: Hearing on proposed standards of safety -- Notice.
law.text: The commissioner shall conduct a hearing prior to the issuance of rules and regulations promulgated pursuant to KRS 227.300. At such hearing interested parties shall be given an opportunity to be heard in person or by counsel. The commissioner shall cause a notice of such hearing to be published pursuant to KRS Chapter 424. No defect or inaccuracy in the notice or in its publication shall invalidate any such rules or regulations.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 395, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 170. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 201, sec. 12.
